resources.string: Insufficient data. The graph will appear when you add more then 3 refills
Developer - Viacheslav Kulish | Designer - Nikitos Marchenko

Standing once again at the gas station, I thought that it would be cool to have an application in which I would record all the fuel costs and It would immediately show the expense, the amount of money spent and other useful statistics. At this point, I decided that not alone I need such an instrument and decided to create GasManager. I very much hope that I have made account of your embezzlement and the calculation of expenditure is a bit more convenient and pleasant. Thank you for using my application. I am pleased to :)
Do not use electrical appliances without the need
With a sharp start and braking you significantly increase fuel consumption. Gather speed smoothly. When braking, try to move more by inertia
If you are driving on an unexpected route, do not rush to gain high speed. It is better to maintain the cruising speed, as a rule - it\'s riding at the maximum gear for 2-2.5 thousand. in a minute
Every 40-50 kg. additional weight increase the consumption by 1-2 liters per 100 km. Therefore, think carefully before transporting the blue whale on your smart!
The included condenser, heating and charging iPhone can increase the consumption up to 15%. However, do not give up comfort for the sake of economy
The better the tires are pumped, the lower the consumption, but at the same time the lower will be the grip on the road

Immediately after refueling, press the + button and enter the refueling data (the volume of fuel, the price per liter and the kilometer indicator on the odometer) To accurately calculate the average flow, refuel at the minimum fue

After adding 3 refills, you will have graphs with useful data under them. Under the schedule with the average expense: the average expense for all the time and the last expense Under the schedule with a distance: the number of kilometers for the entire time and for the current month Under the schedule with the volume of fuel: the volume of fuel for all time and the average volume per month Under the schedule with the price: the amount of money spent for all time and the average amount of money you spend per day

If you liked the application, you can help the developer financially. The application, for your convenience, is completely free, without restrictions and without advertising. I try for you and leave only in the negative. If, suddenly you want to support me, you can click on the button at the bottom of the menu \"Donations\". You will go to the donation page and can choose the option that you like best. This services (costs: 0,99$, 1,99$ and 4,99) does not give any privileges, but every donation pushes me to create and work for you. The number of donations is unlimited. Thanks to everyone who supports me.
Long press on entry to edit
